content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_projectDB;

select * 
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'


    )as result_set


******************************************************************************************************************************


select * 
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'


    )as result_set


******************************************************************************************************************************


select * 
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'


    )as result_set


******************************************************************************************************************************



select * 
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*.csv',
        'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=03/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'


    )as result_set


******************************************************************************************************************************



select * 
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'


    )as result_set


******************************************************************************************************************************


select result_set.filename() as File_Name, result_set.* 
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'


    )as result_set


******************************************************************************************************************************
******************************************************************************************************************************


select result_set.filename() as File_Name, 
    COUNT(*) as record_count
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )as result_set
group by result_set.filename()
order by result_set.filename();

******************************************************************************************************************************


select result_set.filename() as File_Name, 
    COUNT(*) as record_count
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )as result_set
    where result_set.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2021-07.csv','green_tripdata_2020-02.csv')
group by result_set.filename()
order by result_set.filename();

******************************************************************************************************************************



select result_set.filename() as File_Name, 
result_set.filepath() as File_path,
    COUNT(*) as record_count
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )as result_set
    where result_set.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2021-07.csv','green_tripdata_2020-02.csv')
group by result_set.filename(),result_set.filepath()
order by result_set.filename();

******************************************************************************************************************************



select result_set.filename() as File_Name, 
result_set.filepath() as File_path,
result_set.filepath(1) as year,
result_set.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(*) as record_count
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )as result_set
    where result_set.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2021-07.csv','green_tripdata_2020-02.csv')
group by result_set.filename(),result_set.filepath(),result_set.filepath(1),
result_set.filepath(2)
order by result_set.filename();

******************************************************************************************************************************

select result_set.filename() as File_Name, 
result_set.filepath() as File_path,
result_set.filepath(1) as year,
result_set.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(*) as record_count
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )as result_set
    where result_set.filepath(2) in ('01','12')
group by result_set.filename(),result_set.filepath(),result_set.filepath(1),
result_set.filepath(2)
order by result_set.filename();
